author: Staff Reporter
text:
The 27th Road Safety Awareness Week celebration was launched on Monday.

The Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation along with the Regional Transport Offices have jointly arranged for an exhibition on wheels to take forward the importance of road safety to the public. Collector R. Nanthagopal flagged off the bus on the occasion.

The bus contains information on road safety rules. It will travel to various parts of the district for a week to create awareness among the public and students. A rally was also held on the occasion.

P.K. Senthilkumari, Superintendent of Police, Vellore was present, a press release said.
title: Road safety week celebrations take off
